definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: The major or minor term of a syllogism.
sentences.chinese: 伴随三段论的大前提和小前提必然得到的命题。

sentences.english: 355The minor was proved by the major.
sentences.chinese: 355小前提已经被大前提所证明了。

sentences.english: The proposition that must follow from the major and minor premises in a syllogism.
sentences.chinese: 伴随三段论的大前提和小前提必然得到的命题。

sentences.english: In fact, what he mentioned to be beautiful as God is based on the precondition to be born as Ant.
sentences.chinese: 原来他所谓的美如神的大前提还是要生如蚁。

sentences.english: You cannot go wrong, with these three factors. Just my thoughts…
sentences.chinese: 满足这三大前提，你不会挑错的。

sentences.english: It also regards only under the three premises can Marxian transformation theory exist.
sentences.chinese: 马克思的转形理论也只有在这三大前提下才能存在。

definition: conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
to consider/to give serious consideration to sth/consideration
